API Specification (0001-10-en)

Packages
com.fujitsu.xml.xbase.resolver This package provide classes to resolving relative URI by the definition of XML Base specification.
com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.dataset Interface that provides an XLink data set
com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.processor Class that provides XLink processor
com.fujitsu.xml.xpointer.location Interface that provides location information
com.fujitsu.xml.xpointer.processor Class that provides XPointer processor
